item.title: The beginning
item.description: Example Asciidoc PostThis is an example asciidoc post.You can use a manually placed table of contents by setting :toc false in the front matter, but use :toc: macro at the top of the post, and toc::[] where the table of contents is supposed to be, like here:Section 1With some text and maybe even a bulleted list:Thing 1Thing 2Or how about some bold or italicized text?Section 2Will a code snippet work?
